text: Rip in Time is a comic series about dinosaurs. It focuses on the story of Rip Scully traveling back into the Cretaceous time period to rescue his fiancee. == Dinosaurs featured == * Pteranodon (identified as Pterodactyl) * Torosaurus (identified as Triceratops) * Ankylosaurus (identified as Ankylosaur) * Tyrannosaurus * Dilophosaurus * Velociraptor * Apatosaurus * Archaeopteryx (one aggressive nesting female that was killed by Rip) * Stegosaurus * Plesiosaurus (identified as Plesiosaur) Category:Comedy movies Category:Dinosaurs in fiction
title: Rip in Time
